bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yue 噦 , retching. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Za cao 雜草 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry yan ru cao 燕蓐草：亦主噦氣 , “It also controls retching qi”, writes: 亦止噦啘 , “It also stops retching ”. Yun 運 , movements [p]

① Illness Sign identical with tou xuan 頭旋 , spinning head. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：眩是目黑，運是頭旋 , “ 眩 stands for darkness in front of the eyes; 運 stands for a revolving movement [perceived] in the head”.

② Pathological Condition identical with xue yun 血運 , blood[-induced brain-]movements. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 43 ：亦去血過多，亦有下血極少，皆令運 , “If blood is removed excessively, and if blood is purged only in very small quantities, all this leads to movements ”.
